TEXT.S:
Tungli Huoce
Tungli Huoce situsa a tademaw, ci Yu ciusing aci Yan celin, u mudadiway nu Yincumin. kapah kya suni nu heni, sisa, singangantu i Taywan. ayza sa, u mudadiway nu Huayan kanatal putiput.
siwkay nu heni Amilika a ngangan:Power Station kanatal:Conghuaminko binacadan:Taywan Paywan kawaw:mudadiway, misanga' tu dadiw papazaan atu papayzaan:Kulistu kakunizaan nu dadiw:Hulam a dadiw natahkal a kakitizaan:Taywan natahkal a demiad:1997 a mihcaan 10 a bulad 7 a demiad nalimaan:mukawaw a demiad:1997 a mihcaan katukuh ayza Yu ciusing aci Yan celin napahezek nay Nantou sian Sanyu kulisto micudaday. u kulisto ku heni nay wawa henay. yu 22-23 ku mihca nu heni, pulung ku heni mudadiw atu cabay nu heni. katukuh 25 a mihca sa, patizeng ku Power Satation putiput, u Hulam a ngangan sa u . nacaay henay singangan ku heni, mukuli ku heni i hekal, caay kakapah ku uzip. mukawaw i demiad katukuh lamii.
